<title level="1" pfs="">[Noble](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3418)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Envied by many and detested by some, nobles exude confidence and gentility. Gossip and gambling are often nobles' favorite pastimes. Day-to-day life for a noble is usually a mixture of business and leisure, and to an onlooker, such a lifestyle can appear to be nothing more than a string of meals, parties, and game halls.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Noble](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3418)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 13

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +10, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +10, [Games Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +9, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Lip Reader** After years of sticking their nose where it doesn't belong, the noble has learned to read lips from afar. If they're trying to read lips in an encounter or attempting a difficult feat of lip reading, they are [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=72) and [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58), and might need to succeed at a [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) check with a DC determined by the GM.

**Items**
[fashionable fine clothes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2715), [Loaded Dice](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3582), [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36), [silver flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277), signet ring

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +11 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 50

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rapier +10 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Noble's Ruse** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The noble [FeintS](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390). On a success, the noble Strikes the target.

**Sneak Attack**   The noble deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

</column>
